parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The identifier of this element used to reference it in other components

parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: basePath
parameter.description: Base path to use for all requests that reference this config.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The identifier of this element used to reference it in other components

connection.name: oauth-jwt
connection.description: Custom connection provider for OAuth JWT flow

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

connection.name: oauth-user-pass
connection.description: Custom connection provider for username & password flow

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: tlsContext
parameter.description: Reference to a TLS config element. This will enable HTTPS for this config.

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to use for communication. Valid values are HTTP and HTTPS. Default value is HTTP. When using HTTPS the HTTP communication is going to be secured using TLS / SSL. If HTTPS was configured as protocol then the user needs to configure at least the keystore in the tls:context child element of this listener-config.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host where the requests will be sent.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port where the requests will be received.

parameter.name: usePersistentConnections
parameter.description: If false, each connection will be closed after the first request is completed.

parameter.name: connectionIdleTimeout
parameter.description: The number of milliseconds that a connection can remain idle before it is closed. The value of this attribute is only used when persistent connections are enabled. The listener default timeout is bigger than our requester default timeout to avoid 'Remotely closed' exception when you start sending a request on an existing connection just before the timeout occurs.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

operation.name: createBulkJob
operation.description: Creates a job representing a bulk operation that for sending data to Salesforce CDP for asynchronous processing This operation makes an HTTP POST request to the /ingest/jobs endpoint

parameter.name: sourceNameUriParam
parameter.description: Name of Ingestion source API to work with

parameter.name: objectNameUriParam
parameter.description: Name of object to work with

parameter.name: operationUriParam
parameter.description: Operation to be executed

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getCalculatedInsightWithFiltersFieldsAndLimit
operation.description: Use this API to query the calculated insights. Users can slice, dice, and filter by selecting different dimensions, measures and filters. This operation makes an HTTP GET request to the /insight/calculated-insights/{ci-name} endpoint

parameter.name: ciNameUriParam
parameter.description: The calculated insight name.

parameter.name: dimensionsQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated list of dimensions to be projected. By default, this parameter includes all of the available dimensions.

parameter.name: measuresQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated list of measures to be projected. By default, this parameter includes all of the available measures.

parameter.name: limitQueryParam
parameter.description: The number of items to return. By default, the maximum number, 4999 items are returned.

parameter.name: offsetQueryParam
parameter.description: Number of rows to skip before starting to return.

parameter.name: filtersQueryParam
parameter.description: This parameter is added to a select query to select results of only a specific type.

parameter.name: orderbyQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma seperated values to sort the result-set in ascending or descending order.

parameter.name: timeGranularityQueryParam
parameter.description: User specified granularity if ci has one or more time dimensions available.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getComputedViewForProfile
operation.description: Returns data model objects and a computed view based on indexes and search filters. This operation makes an HTTP GET request to the /profile/{dataModelName}/{id}/calculated-insights/{ci_name} endpoint

parameter.name: dataModelNameUriParam
parameter.description: Data model object API name.

parameter.name: idUriParam
parameter.description: The value of an indexed column.

parameter.name: ciNameUriParam
parameter.description: The calculated insight name.

parameter.name: searchKeyQueryParam
parameter.description: Index name if object's ID is different from primary key.

parameter.name: dimensionsQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated name of the dimensions to be part of result from the computed view. By default includes all the dimensions.

parameter.name: measuresQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated name of the measures to be part of result from the computed view. By default includes all the measures.

parameter.name: limitQueryParam
parameter.description: The numbers of items to return.

parameter.name: filtersQueryParam
parameter.description: Filters are applied only on the parent object.

parameter.name: offsetQueryParam
parameter.description: Number of rows to skip before starting to return.

parameter.name: orderbyQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated values to sort the result-set in ascending or descending order.

parameter.name: timeGranularityQueryParam
parameter.description: User specified granularity if ci has one or more time dimensions available.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getParent
operation.description: Returns data model objects based on search indexes and filters. Use this API call to retrieve the object record based on the primary key or secondary keys. Returns an empty list when records are not found. This operation makes an HTTP GET request to the /profile/{dataModelName}/{id} endpoint

parameter.name: dataModelNameUriParam
parameter.description: Data model object API name.

parameter.name: idUriParam
parameter.description: The value of the primary/secondary key field. Defaults to primary key when not specified.

parameter.name: searchKeyQueryParam
parameter.description: The name of the key field, if a field other than the primary key is used.

parameter.name: fieldsQueryParam
parameter.description: Distinct comma-separated name of fields that you want to include in the result. Not specifying this parameter will return an arbitrary set of fields.

parameter.name: filtersQueryParam
parameter.description: A set of comma-separated equality expressions, within square brackets.

parameter.name: limitQueryParam
parameter.description: The numbers of records to be returned.

parameter.name: orderbyQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated values to sort the result-set in ascending or descending order. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

parameter.name: offsetQueryParam
parameter.description: Number of rows to skip before starting to return. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getParentAndChild
operation.description: Returns data model objects and child objects based on indexes and search filters. This operation makes an HTTP GET request to the /profile/{dataModelName}/{id}/{childDataModelName} endpoint

parameter.name: dataModelNameUriParam
parameter.description: Data model object API name.

parameter.name: idUriParam
parameter.description: The value of an indexed column.

parameter.name: childDataModelNameUriParam
parameter.description: Child data model object API name.

parameter.name: searchKeyQueryParam
parameter.description: Index name if object's ID is different from primary key.

parameter.name: fieldsQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated name of the fields to be part of result from the child entity. Not specifying will give the first 10 alphabetically sorted fields.

parameter.name: limitQueryParam
parameter.description: The numbers of items to return.

parameter.name: filtersQueryParam
parameter.description: Filters are applied only on the parent object.

parameter.name: offsetQueryParam
parameter.description: Number of rows to skip before starting to return.

parameter.name: orderbyQueryParam
parameter.description: Comma separated values to sort the result-set in ascending or descending order.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors
